maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/0/.orig: Girl, you sure are a natural with that ball thing!
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/0/.text: Apparemment, lancer des boules ça a l'air d'être inné chez toi !

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/0/.orig: Carla, they are called VRPs.\. Not "balls".
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/0/.text: Carla, Ça s'appelle des VRPs.\. Pas "des boules".

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/0/.orig: Ah, c'mon! Nobody calls them that anymore, y'know?
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/0/.text: Roh, aller ! Plus personne ne les appelle comme ça !

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/30.orig: Well done!\. Yeah that was all.\. It's a small room.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/30.text: Bien joué !\. Oui, c'est tout pour cette petite pièce.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: What are ya standing around here for?\. The wall is gone, the path is clear.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Pourquoi est-ce que tu restes planté là ?\. La paroi n'est plus là, le chemin est libre !
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.note: (berliner) mauer is weg, weg is frei !

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Up for some spoilers?
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Besoin de spoilers ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Well something is different about this switch, right?
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Bon, il y a quelque chose de différent avec cet interrupteur, non ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: I'm afraid one ball just won't cut it.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Je pense que ce n'est pas juste une boule qui va en venir à bout.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Now, several balls on the other hand...
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Par contre, plusieurs boules...

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Right, then! Go on!
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Tout va bien alors ! Continue !

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: [Yes]
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: [Oui]

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: [No]
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: [Non]

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Nah, I won't give ya a hint for that, girl.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Non, je vais pas te donner d'indice pour ça.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: You removed the wall, the rest is straightforward.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Tu as déjà enlevé la paroi, le reste c'est tout simple.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Oh yeah, that one is kinda mean.\. Need a hint?
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Ah oui, celui-là il est un peu méchant.\. Besoin d'aide ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Did you try to hit this switch with charged balls?
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Est-ce que tu as essayé de toucher cet interrupteur avec une boule chargée ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: You probably realized that doesn't work.\. It's too slow.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Tu as probablement remarqué que ça ne marche pas.\. Elles sont trop lentes.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: How about you look around?\. There might be another way.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Mais si tu regardais autour ?\. Il y a peu être un autre moyen.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Right, then! Go on!
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Tout va bien alors ! Continue !

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: [Yes]
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: [Oui]

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: [No]
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: [Non]

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Heh, this is so much fun.\. Just too bad we can't chat along the way...
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Hé, c'était trop cool.\. C'est juste dommage que l'on puisse pas discuter un peu.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Ah, don't worry!\. I'm sure Sergey will get the speech problem fixed in no time.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Ah, c'est pas grave !\. Je suis sûr que Sergey va trouver une solution.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: Am I right, Sergey?
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: J'ai pas raison, Sergey ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: It is...\. challenging to say the least.
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: C'est...\. assez compliqué on va dire.

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.orig: It wouldn't kill you to be a little more optimistic...
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.text: Ça ne te coûterait rien d'être un peu plus optimiste...
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/33.note: de: tu as encore ecorché ton optimisme dans tes chaussettes !

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/34.orig: Entering the next stage, more switches await!
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/34.text: Et on passe au niveau suivant, d'autres interrupteurs t'attendent !

maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/46.orig:
Wrong direction, girl.\.
Gotta reach the teleporter!
maps/cargo-ship/room1-5.json/entities/46.text:
Mauvaise direction, Lea !\.
Il faut qu'on atteigne le téléporteur !

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/27/s.orig: Oh yeah!\. Never mind the visor!\. I just need this to see what you're doing.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/27/s.text: Ah oui !\. Ne fais pas attention à mes lunettes !\. J'en ai juste besoin pour voir ce que tu fais.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/27/s.orig: Do not worry about it for now.\. We will explain it to you later on.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/27/s.text: Ne t'inquiète pas pour ça maintenant.\. On te l'expliquera plus tard.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Huh? Don't tell me you're already stuck?
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Hein ? Me dit pas que tu es déjà coincée ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Gee, back to the basics.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Bon, revenons aux bases.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Look, how about you try to jump over this container here?
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Regarde, si tu essayais de sauter au-dessus de ce conteneur-là ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: That cardboard box ain't there for no reason.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Ce carton n'est pas là pour rien.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Walk toward small object to auto-jump on top of them.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Marchez vers les petits objets pour sauter automatiquement dessus.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Right, then! Go on!
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Tout va bien alors ! Continue !

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [Yes]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [Oui]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [No]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [Non]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Need a hint?
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Besoin d'un indice ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: So, that wall ain't there anymore. You're free to pass.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Bon, cette paroi n'est plus là maintenant. Tu peux passer.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Now all that's left is some jumping over those containers.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Tout ce qu'il reste à faire, c'est sauter au-dessus de ces conteneurs.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Move toward edges to auto-jump over gaps.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Allez vers les bords pour automatiquement sauter au-dessus des trous.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: You need to find a way to remove this wall.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Il faut que tu trouves un moyen pour enlever cette paroi.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Basic stuff, Lea. You'll need to throw balls at something.\. That's all I'm gonna say.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: C'est un jeu d'enfant, Lea. Il suffit de lancer une boule sur quelque chose.\. C'est tout ce que je vais dire.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Right, then! Go on!
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Tout va bien alors ! Continue !

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [Yes]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [Oui]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [No]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [Non]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Need a hint?
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Besoin d'un indice ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Y'know, ball throwing is pretty much the solution to most obstacles around here.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: T'sais, lancer des boules c'est un peu la solution à tous les problèmes ici.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Those boxes here are no exception.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Ces boites ne font pas exception.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Well, ain't that just another stupid wall....
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Eh bien, si ce n'est pas encore une' paroi idiote...

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: But the color is different this time. Maybe that means something, who knows?
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Mais la couleur est différente cette fois. Ptet que ça veut dire quelque chose, qui sait ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: I'm pretty sure you yourself can't pass it.\. But maybe something else can...?
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Je suis sûr que tu ne peux pas passer à travers.\. Mais peut-être que quelque chose d'autre le peut ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Right, then! Go on!
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Tout va bien alors ! Continue !

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [Yes]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [Oui]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [No]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [Non]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Well, would ya look at all those switches! Need a hint?
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Hé, regarde un peu tous ces interrupteurs ! Besoin d'un indice ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [nods]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [acquiesce]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Yeah, that switch is pretty well hidden, huh?
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Oui, cet interrupteur est assez bien planqué, hein ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Remember those charged balls?\. Those bounce on walls, y'know?
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Tu te souviens des boules chargées ?\. Celles qui rebondissent aux murs ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: I'm sure those will help ya out here.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Je suis sûr qu'elles peuvent t'aider ici.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: See those switches on the containers? Yes, you can hit those. From a distance, that is!
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Tu vois ces interrupteurs sur le conteneur ? Oui, tu peux les toucher. À distance, bien sûr !

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Just make sure you throw the balls from the same height.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Fais juste en sorte de lancer les boules depuis la même hauteur.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Really?\. You can't figure this one out?
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Vraiment ?\. Tu n'arrives pas à t'en sortir ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Just jump over the boxes and hit that thing hard.\. That's all, really.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: Il faut juste sauter sur les boites et massacrer ce truc.\. C'est tout.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [shakes head]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [secoue la tête]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: Right, then! Go on! You're almost there!
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: C'est bon alors ! Continue ! T'y est presque !

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [Yes]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [Oui]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: [No]
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: [Non]

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.orig: That's all for this room!\. Nice work, girl!
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.text: C'est tout pour cette salle !\. C'est un bon début !
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/39/s.note: de: pas mal pour une première fois

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/51/s.orig: Your task is to reach the door at the other end of this room.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/51/s.text: Ton objectif est d'atteindre cette porte de l'autre côté de la salle.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/51/s.orig: And don't mind me! I'll just stick around and keep an eye on ya.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/51/s.text: Et ne fais pas attention à moi ! Je vais juste trainer autour et garder un oeil sur toi.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/51/s.orig: Well... I might give you some hints. If you ask nicely, y'know?
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/51/s.text: Bon sinon... J'peux t'donner quelques indices. Si tu demandes gentiment...

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/62/s.orig:
Wrong direction, girl.\.
Gotta reach the teleporter!
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/62/s.text:
Mauvaise direction, Lea !\.
Il faut qu'on atteigne le téléporteur !

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/80/s.orig: Damn, how're we gonna pass this one?!
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/80/s.text: Bon sang, comment on va passer à travers celui-là ?

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/80/s.orig: Actually, never mind. You can just go ahead and \c[3]snipe it away\c[0].
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/80/s.text: En fait, j'ai rien dit. Tu peux juste y aller et le \c[3]dégommer\c[0].

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/80/s.orig: But I'm still gonna do my resourceful instant matter building, don't mind me.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/80/s.text: Mais je vais quand même faire mes constructions géniales en instant-matière, t'occupes pas de moi.

maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/86/s.orig: Carla, Instant Matter builder, at your service.
maps/cargo-ship/room1.json/entities/86/s.text: Carla, architecte en Instant-Matière, à votre service !

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/23/s.orig: Welcome to the rats' fortress, standing unpenetrated for centuries!
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/23/s.text: Bienvenue dans la forteresse des rats, jamais envahie depuis des siècles !

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/23/s.orig: Apparently somebody had a fun time putting this together.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/23/s.text: Faut croire que quelqu'un s'est bien amusé à construire tout ça.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/49/s.orig: Just hit 'em with those balls. That's all there is to it.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/49/s.text: Il faut juste les toucher avec des boules ! C'est tout.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/49/s.orig: Yeah, you're probably missing the mouse robots here.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/49/s.text: Oui, tu dois te demander ou sont les robots-souris là.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/49/s.orig: Those things are pretty small, y'know?\. Might be they're hidden somewhere...
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/49/s.text: Ces machins sont assez petits, t'sais ?\. Ils sont peut-être planqués quelque part...

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/49/s.orig: Ain't no way you're getting close to those mouse robots in that corner.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/49/s.text: Tu ne trouveras pas de moyen pour te rapprocher du recoin avec les souris.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/49/s.orig: But you can still hit them, y'know? Remember the orange walls? Balls flying through them and all?
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/49/s.text: Mais tu peux quand même lancer quelques boules à travers la paroi orange.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/49/s.orig: Girl, that was so quick!\. Took me forever to put all of this together.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/49/s.text: Meuf, c'était rapide !\. Ça m'a pris une éternité pour construire tous ces trucs.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/59/s.orig: Ha, finally!\. This one's my favorite!
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/59/s.text: Ah, enfin !\. Celui-là c'est mon préféré.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/59/s.orig: Here you can go wild on these robot mice!
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/59/s.text: Ici tu peux t'éclater sur ces souris-robots !
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/59/s.note: de: tellement t'éclater sur ces souris que la truie va rester allongée ! (?)

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/59/s.orig: Moving target practice!\. Have fun, girl!
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/59/s.text: C'est presque un exercice de tir avec des cibles mouvantes !\. Amuse-toi bien !

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/59/s.orig: Press \i[throw] repeatedly to hold down the enemies in a rapid fire.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/59/s.text: Appuyez sur \i[throw] répétitive ment pour contenir les ennemis avec des tirs rapides

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/59/s.orig: Hold \i[throw] to hold down the enemies in a rapid fire.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/59/s.text: Restez appuyé sur \i[throw] pour contenir les ennemis avec des tirs rapides

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/65/s.orig:
Wrong direction, girl.\.
Gotta reach the teleporter!
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/65/s.text:
Mauvaise direction, Lea !\.
Il faut qu'on atteigne le téléporteur !

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/84/s.text: Ah non, toi, tu vas rester là !
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/84/s.note: "Das wirste schön bleiben lassen!" j'ai rien compris

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.orig: Hold on!\. W-What is this damage?!
That's what I wanna ask! That's not normal, right?!
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.text: C'est c'que je voulais te d'mander ! C'est pas normal, hein ?!

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.orig: No way! Did I forgot to remove \c[3]that\c[0] code fragment?!
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.text: Oh non ! J'aurais pas oublié d'enlever \c[3]ce\c[0] morceau de code ?!

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.orig: What the heck did ya do?!
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.text: Mais qu'est-ce que tu as fait ?!

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.orig: I-It was just a little experiment!\. Seeing if I could somehow tamper with the damage output in a secure way.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.text: C-C'était juste une petite expérience !\. Je voulais voir si je pouvais augmenter la quantité de dégâts de manière sûre.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.orig: ... and I forgot to comment out that part.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.text: ... Et j'ai oublié de commenter cette partie.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.orig: Oh...\. Oh no...\. I do not think I can undo this...
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.text: Oh...\. Oh non...\. Je crains que je ne puisse pas revenir en arrière...

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.orig: Congratulations, sir.\. You've created a monster.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.text: Ah ben félicitations, monsieur.\. Vous venez de créer un monstre.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.orig: Damn girl!\. Those mice are dropping much faster than I expected.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.text: Bon sang, meuf !\. Ces souris disparaissent bien plus vite que prévu.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.orig: Yes. That is because she is way over-leveled.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.text: Oui ; C'est parce qu'elle a un niveau bien trop élevé.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.orig: Huh? Wasn't she supposed to start at level 1?
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.text: Hein ? Elle n'était pas censée commencer au niveau 1 ?

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.orig: That was the plan. Something must have gone wrong, it seems.
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.text: Normalement si. Mais il faut croire que ça n'a pas marché.

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.orig: Well, she sure seems to enjoy herself!
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/86/s.text: Bon, en tout cas ça a l'air de lui faire plaisir !

maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/87/s.orig: Stop defeating our troupe! They are not supposed to be defeated!!
maps/cargo-ship/room2.json/entities/87/s.text: Arrête d'anéantir nos troupes ! Elles ne sont pas censées se faire anéantir !!
